title: Aboriginal Rules (2006)
brief_description: Independently funded 55 minute documentary produced in 2006 by Warlpiri Media Association. Directed by Liam Campbell and co-directed by Francis Jupurrurla Kelly and Neil Jupurrurla White, Aboriginal Rules follows the Yuendumu Magpies AFL team for a year. Over that time we see the highs and lows of their aspiration to win the Central Australia Football League Grand Final. We also get an insight into the challenges of young Aboriginal men growing up on settlements.

constellations_other.name: Culture and identity on the Australian screen
constellations_other.description: Australian screen culture is distinctive, unexpected, playful and serious when it matters. Indigenous productions make a huge contribution to the unique identity of the Australian moving image.
